snippet.title: Shooty Ballz Demo - GMTK Game Jam 2020
snippet.description:
A Twin Stick Shooter with a bit of a twist! Your objective is to protect the green ball.. from yourself! Shoot EVERYTHING Except the green ball.
Pay attention to your Control Gauge. If it runs out, you will go Out of Control.

Play this game for free: https://arvz.itch.io/shooty-ballz

This game was created by Sheng Xu and Arvin Gunawan from scratch in 48 hours for the 2020 Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam.
